document_name: Decree No. 2016-0528-P-RM of 26 July 2016 laying down the organization and modalities of operation of the Management Unit of the Great Green Wall
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MLI/2016/MLI-2016-07-26-Decree No. 2016-0528-P-RM of 26 July 2016 laying down the organization and modalities of operation of the Management Unit of the Great Green Wall_5328e380e09373a6f36eef62a5422c6a.pdf
document_description: This decree sets the organization and operating procedures of the Great Green Wall Management Unit (UGMV). The Great Green Wall Management Unit is attached to the General Secretariat of the Ministry of the Environment.
